channel.title: CVE Feed for Inist-CNRS -- ezmaster

item.title: CVE-2019-16767|2024-08-05T01:24:47.259Z -- inist-cnrs -- ezmaster
item.description: The admin sys mode is now conditional and dedicated for the special case. By default, since ezmaster@5.2.11 no instance (container) is launched with advanced capabilities (not launched as root)
